content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm pleased to meet you. Now, about the rental price, I think a price of €1,000 per month would be fair for this newly built apartment in the city center. Remember, it's close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is very convenient, but I'm looking to rent a place that is not only well-located but also affordable. Could we discuss a price that would be more in line with my budget?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, let's negotiate. What price did you have in mind? Remember, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. So, I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm also not afraid to end this negotiation if I feel the offer is too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I was thinking around the €800 mark would be more in line with my budget. I believe this is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your budget constraints, but €800 is quite low for this apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I can go down to €900, but not lower. This is a great apartment in a prime location, and I believe €900 is a fair price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but €900 is still a bit higher than I can afford. I'm a student, and I'm looking for something that won't stretch my budget too much. Could we meet in the middle, perhaps at €850? I think this is a fair compromise considering the amenities and the condition of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but €850 is still quite low for this apartment. However, considering your circumstances, I'm willing to make an exception. I agree to the price of €875 Euro. This is the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to accommodate my budget. €875 is a fair price, and I believe it's a good compromise for both parties. I agree to the price of €875 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of €875 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
